name: Vermin (Neda Games)
description:
Vermin is a very addictive and entertaining game.

Touch the seals to eliminate them and prevent them from coming out of the water.

Game instructions:

- Touch the buttons, to touch the seals and eliminate them, Vermin will do it automatically.

- Get in the right position to eliminate the seals

- Touch the correct buttons and touch the seals.

- The seals will begin to swim creating waves in the water, put yourself in the correct position, to be able to eliminate them, when they show their heads.

Game features:

- Two game modes.

- Three lives.

- Restart game.

- High score saved in both modes.

- Exit button.

- Action game with exciting sounds and animations.
